video.title: Planet Earth: The Complete Collection
video.synopsis: This landmark series transports nature lovers from the Himalayan Mountains to the depths of the ocean and everywhere in between.

episodes.synopsis: This episode looks at our planet as a whole and considers the key factors that have shaped its natural history.
episodes.title: From Pole to Pole

episodes.synopsis: Explore the world's mightiest mountain ranges, from the birth of a mountain at one of the lowest places on Earth to the summit of Everest.
episodes.title: Mountains

episodes.synopsis: This episode follows the descent of rivers from their mountain sources to the sea and showcases the wildlife found within their unexplored waters.
episodes.title: Fresh Water

episodes.synopsis: This episode probes the mysterious, perpetual darkness and reveals the unknown underground world of caves, caverns and tunnels.
episodes.title: Caves

episodes.synopsis: Explore the arid landscapes of the world's deserts, which are united by their lack of rain, yet they are the most varied of our planet's ecosystems.
episodes.title: Deserts

episodes.synopsis: Journey to the polar extremes of our planet, where for most of the year, the Arctic and Antarctic are locked in ice.
episodes.title: Ice Worlds

episodes.synopsis: The plains of Africa, Asia, North America and the Arctic cover more than a quarter of the land on Earth, and one thing is at their heart -- grass.
episodes.title: Great Plains

episodes.synopsis: Explore the world's most spectacular forest vistas and see unprecedented views of the species that live on the dark jungle floor.
episodes.title: Jungles

episodes.synopsis: The coral reefs in tropical Indonesia are rich in diversity and home to myriad fantasy-like creatures, including pygmy seahorses and "electric" clams.
episodes.title: The Shallow Seas

episodes.synopsis: From the evergreen forests of the frozen North to the deciduous dry forests of the equator, this episode reveals the planet's greatest woodlands.
episodes.title: Seasonal Forests

episodes.synopsis: Dive in to visit the animals that dwell on the ocean's surface or within its deepest abyss, where finding food and conserving energy is paramount.
episodes.title: Ocean Deep
